structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Service Of Copy Of Indictment For Murder On Prisoner, Etc.
law.text: After the finding of an indictment for murder, the defendant, if in custody, shall forthwith be served by the sheriff or his deputy with a copy thereof and with an order of the court notifying him that the indictment will be entered forthwith upon the docket of the superior court for the county where found.
